column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis programme aims to develop and extend your knowledge of the complex intersections between learning and the physical and digital environments in which this takes place, so as to improve future educational spaces. Having an understanding of learning spaces policy, development , design, management and pedagogy gives you an important specialism in a crucial emerging field worldwide. Never has such knowledge been more important than in this COVID-19 era.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
